|footnotes = |pop_est_footnotes = }} Mission Hill is a town in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Yankton County, and 190 people lived there at the 2020 census. Mission Hill became a town in 1913. ==References== Category:Towns in South Dakota Category:1913 establishments in the United States Category:1910s establishments in South Dakota
